'''Czarnieck''' was a skilled [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who taught at the [[Academy of Mentalist Study]] in [[Eileanar]] shortly before its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Czarnieck specialized in mind-control spells, and applied his expertise by teaching under the supervision of Dean [[Zucchi]].
